meanings.definition: A store where books are sold.
meanings.sent1: I visited the bookstore to buy a new novel.
meanings.sent2: My favorite place to spend time is the bookstore.
meanings.sent3: Why did the novel go to the bookstore? To find its sequel!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a bookstore filled with stories waiting to be read.
meanings.sent5: The smell of paper and ink enveloped me as I entered the bookstore.

meanings.definition: A place where books are available for purchase.
meanings.sent1: At the bookstore, I found the perfect gift for my friend.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore on the corner has a great selection of books.
meanings.sent3: The bookstore was so crowded that even the fictional characters had to wait in line.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, memories were neatly arranged on shelves like books in a bookstore.
meanings.sent5: The bookstore beckoned to me with promises of new adventures within its pages.
